snippet: With the All-Pro Darrelle Revis out for the season, Antonio Cromartie has effectively taken on the role as his team’s shutdown cornerback.
abstract: New York Jets cornerback Antonio Cromartie has effectively taken on the role as his team's shutdown cornerback, with All-Pro Darrelle Revis out for the season.
lead_paragraph: With the All-Pro Darrelle Revis out for the season, Antonio Cromartie has effectively taken on the role as his team’s shutdown cornerback.

headline.seo: Antonio Cromartie Transforming Reputation as Jets Cornerback
headline.main: Inspired by Revis, and Assuming His Role
headline.print_headline: Inspired by Revis, And Assuming His Role
